about.p1: AORON is a manufacturing brand offering stylish, quality and competitive apparel for B2B partnerships.  We have been operating since 1991 and specialize in creating men's and women's clothing, focused on wholesale, retail chains and custom orders for brands and boutiques.
about.li: Prince - a classic line of men's suits, proven by time and quality;
about.li2: AORON - a modern brand with an expanded assortment: from casual wear to accessories and shoes.
about.p2: Our company started with a team of 4 people and today employs over 100 people. In the summer of 2025,we are launching a new factory with the ability to scale production - up to 500 employees and 5000+ units per month.

ul.title: We offer:
ul.li3: Flexibility to work under private label

ul2.title: Why choose us
ul2.li1: More than 30 years of experience in the market of Uzbekistan
ul2.li2: Full cycle of production - from design to packaging
ul2.li3: Modern models inspired by global trends
ul2.li4: Favorable conditions for distributors, marketplaces and stores
ul2.li5: Ability to create collections for your brand

ul3.title: New assortment 2025
ul3.li1: Men's and women's T-shirts, shirts, shorts
ul3.li4: Collaborations and capsule collections to your specifications

ul4.title: Ready for cooperation
ul4.text: We are open to cooperation with:
ul4.li5: Brands willing to produce collections under their name
ul4.p: Contact us to get catalog, samples

about.p: To create exceptional menswear that empowers men to look and feel their best, while maintaining a commitment to quality, sustainability, and ethical

values.title: Quality  First
values.description: We never compromise on quality. From fabrics to construction, every element is carefully chosen for excellence.
values.description2: We're committed to reducing our environmental impact through responsible sourcing and sustainable practices.
